name: Wings Of Steam
description:
For centuries the fairies of the flower kingdom have lived in harmony with nature, taking care of the plants and animals in return for magical energy. But over time, the fairies turned greedy, harvesting energy for machines and their own power directly from its source while treating their environment with neglect.

But now nature stroke back, not only robbing the fairies of their magical powers, but threatening to annihilate the kingdom and everyone in it. You are Ava, a protector, and your mission is to find a way to restore the balance destroyed by your kind.

You can play both with keyboard or gamepad, see the Controls section in the settings for bindings.

This game was part of a Game Design bachelor thesis, and might be developed into a full game at some point.
